comment_text: To top it off, a 3rd time-lapse kayaking video's required, with I'm On a Boat by The Lonely Island as the song.  A playlist could be made of the 3. That would truly be peak YouTube! I suppose some things are too good to be true...
I really enjoy the song, it's pretty grape!
I ENJOYED THESE CHRISTIANS HAVING FUN
I enjoyed that, maybe the gator was asleep
